New Records: Bobby Witt Jr. recorded his 100th RBI and 31st home run of the season during the game
Key Match Events: The Royals' victory marked a turning point in their season, helping them secure a playoff berth
Post-Match Reflections: The Royals celebrated the win, highlighting their resilience and the significance of the victory for their playoff push
